name: GlovePIE Controller Script
summary: Learn about .PIE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: GlovePIE scripts are available for a wide range of devices, including gloves, joysticks, gamepads, microphones, the Wii Remote, and several other controllers.

description: Script that allows a hardware controller to work with GlovePIE (Glove Programmable Input Emulator); maps hardware functions, such as movements and button actions, to software commands; allows non-PC input devices (not just gloves) to be used with a Windows computer.
